snippet: A new iPhone app wants to make sense of the hundreds of contacts across your various social networks and then gently remind you to make contact with friends and colleagues you're losing touch with.
abstract: A new iPhone app wants to make sense of the hundreds of contacts across your various social networks and then gently remind you to make contact with friends and colleagues you're losing touch with.

headline.main: Brewster, a Mobile App, Wants to Transform Your Address Book
